00023 template<typename H, typename T> void tuple_to_many(many &m, const cons<H, T> &t)
00024 {
00025     m.push_back(any(t.get_head()));
00026     tuple_to_many(m, t.get_tail());
00027 }

00034 template<typename T> many tuple_to_many(const T tup)
00035 {
00036     many m;
00037     tuple_to_many(m, tup);
00038     return m;

00045 template<typename H, typename T> void many_to_tuple(const many &m, size_t i, cons<H, T> &t)
00046 {
00047     t.get_head()=any_cast<H>(m[i]);
00048     many_to_tuple(m, ++i, t.get_tail());
00049 }

00060     many_to_tuple(m,0,t);

00077 template<typename T> class TupleManyConvert : public ITupleManyConvert
00078 {
00079 private:
00080     const T &_tuple;
00081     many _many;
00082     bool _hasmany;
00083 public:
00088     TupleManyConvert(const T &tuple) : _tuple(tuple), _hasmany(false){}
00093     const many& operator()()
00094     {
00095         if (!_hasmany)
00096         {
00097             _many=tuple_to_many(_tuple);
00098         }
00099         return _many;
00100     }
00101 };
